name: Sanction
text:
§446E-3  Sanction.  Any person who violates this chapter shall be deemed to have engaged in an unfair or deceptive act or practice pursuant to section 480-2. [L 1979, c 135, pt of §2; am L 1999, c 171, §4]
 
Case Notes
 
  Defendants' argument that this section shifts the burden of proof from the plaintiffs to the defendants and that the burden shifting is unconstitutional, lacked merit.  486 F. Supp. 2d 1132 (2006).
